full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
# **Electromagnetic Conductivity Meter and Control Unit Procurement**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada invites qualified vendors to submit a proposal for the supply of an Electromagnetic Conductivity Meter and a Control Unit. The procurement is subject to the following conditions:

## **Procurement Details**
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4001845502
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 31, 2023, at 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Exired

## **Procurement Category and Method**
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

## **Notice Type**
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

## **Trade Agreements**
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## **Regions of Opportunity**
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None specified

## **Regions of Delivery**
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

## **Contracting Entity Information**
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
  Canada

## **Contact Information**
* **Contact Person:** Stephen Van Den Hanenberg
* **Contact Email:** stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17159078?extsite=MTcxNTkwNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17159078?extsite=MTcxNTkwNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## **Tender Description**
A proposal is required for the supply of an Electromagnetic Conductivity Meter and a Control Unit, which must meet the Mandatory Technical Requirements specified in the RFP. The vendor must provide all necessary equipment, operator manual, accessories, and components for the Conductivity Meter and the Control Unit to work in accordance with the Mandatory Technical
